name: Corporation Inc.
description:
Corporation Inc. has made a deal of a century, and everyone's up at the penthouse celebrating. You're about to join them, when you notice you've fucked up, and the deal is in jeopardy. You need to make changes to the contract, but it needs to be signed by legal, marketing and accounting department. The problem is they've all had a few, and it might not be so easy to get them.

Made in 48 hours, for Global Game Jam 2020
